data.name: Emotes creator tool - Haircuts
data.detailed_description:
Emotes Creator Tool Haircuts pack is a DLC including some new elements for your emotes:
New haircuts in 3 base colors, allowing you to change to any color
100 versions for face emotes
100 versions for 3/4 emotes

200 new design to use in your creations
data.about_the_game:
